name: proyectoweb
description: Nuestro primer proyecto de Node Js

scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html  && usemin prices.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/prices.html && usemin TemsConditions.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/TemsConditions.html && usemin contactUs.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contactUs.html && usemin aboutUs.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/aboutUs.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run scss && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin

author: Mateo Preisiga
